content:
# FACTORY REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at position(-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=-0.5) - working
- Boiler (position x=-5.0, y=2.5) - fuel added but needs regular refueling
- Steam engine (position x=0.5, y=6.5) - working, generating energy (14880.0)
- Pipe network connecting these components - improved with additional pipes at positions (-3.5, 2.5), (-1.5, 2.5), (-0.5, 4.5)
- Small electric pole (position x=4.5, y=6.5) - connected to electricity network

### Secondary Power Generation System at position(-9.5, 1.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=1.5) - working
- Boiler (position x=-4.5, y=10.0) - fuel added but needs regular refueling
- Steam engine (position x=0.5, y=18.5) - not connected to power network
- Pipe network connecting these components - improved with additional pipe at position (-1.5, 10.5)
- Small electric pole (position x=2.5, y=18.5)

### Iron Production Line at position(17.5, 72.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position x=17.5, y=72.5) - connected to power network but not yet receiving power
- Stone furnace (position x=18.0, y=76.0) with coal fuel
- Transport belt (position x=17.5, y=74.5) to collect iron ore
- Inserter (position x=18.5, y=74.5) that moves ore from belt to furnace - not receiving power
- Inserter (position x=18.5, y=77.5) that takes iron plates from furnace - not receiving power
- Wooden chest (position x=18.5, y=78.5) for iron plate storage
- Inserter (position x=18.5, y=79.5) that takes iron plates from chest - not receiving power
- Small electric pole (position x=19.5, y=75.5) for power connection
- Transport belt system connecting to electronic circuit assembly (26 belts)

### Copper Production Line at position(-47.5, 75.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position x=-47.5, y=75.5) - connected to power network but not yet receiving power
- Stone furnace (position x=-47.0, y=79.0) with coal fuel
- Transport belt (position x=-47.5, y=77.5) to collect copper ore
- Inserter (position x=-46.5, y=80.5) that takes copper plates from furnace - not receiving power
- Wooden chest (position x=-46.5, y=81.5) for copper plate storage
- Inserter (position x=-46.5, y=82.5) that takes copper plates from chest - not receiving power
- Small electric pole (position x=-46.5, y=77.5) for power connection
- Transport belt system connecting to copper cable assembly (53 belts)

### Manual Iron Smelting at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position x=0.0, y=0.0) - working, with coal fuel
- Currently processing iron ore into iron plates

### Manual Copper Smelting at position(10.0, 10.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position x=10.0, y=10.0) - working, with coal fuel
- Currently processing copper ore into copper plates

### Copper Cable Assembly at position(-6.5, 98.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position x=-6.5, y=98.5) set to copper cable recipe - connected to power network
- Inserter (position x=-8.5, y=98.5) that feeds copper plates to assembler - not receiving power
- Inserter (position x=-4.5, y=98.5) that takes copper cables from assembler - not receiving power
- Wooden chest (position x=-3
